SummaryEnglish: Shin Captain Tsubasa (新・キャプテン翼, lit. New Captain Tsubasa) is a Japanese original video animation (OVA) animated by Animate Film and produced by CBS Sony Group and Shueisha. Shin CT takes place at the U-16 word cup in France. After some friendly matches in Germany, Japan defeats one opponent after another and finally reaches the final round against Germany.
SummaryJapanese: シンCTはフランスのU-16ワードカップで開催されます。 ドイツでの親善試合の後、日本は次々と対戦相手を打ち負かし、ついにドイツとの最終ラウンドに到達しました。

1.TitleEnglish: Spread your wings, Tsubasa! Towards the world challenge
1.SummaryEnglish: We are in the retirement of the junior national team of Japan, in which the best 24 players in the league take part
1.TitleJapanese: 翼よはばたけ! 世界への挑戦

2.SummaryEnglish: The Japanese national team finally leaves for Europe. First stage Germany, where it will collide with the U-15 of Hamburg
2.TitleJapanese: 敗北! ゼロからの再出発

3.SummaryEnglish: Badly defeated by Hamburg and Werder Bremen, Japan, which is already in France, home of the World Cup for youth, must face Italy and then Bayern Munich
3.TitleJapanese: 復活! ゴールデン・コンビ

4.SummaryEnglish: Everything is ready to start this highly anticipated international tournament for U-15 representatives. Japan finally knows its rivals
4.TitleJapanese: 集結! 世界のライバルたち

5.SummaryEnglish: Kick off the first tournament challenge, facing Italy and Japan.
5.TitleJapanese: 対決! ヘルナンデスを倒せ

6.SummaryEnglish: Japan beats Italy thanks to the entry into the field of Tom Becker and the rediscovered splendor of the golden couple.

7.TitleEnglish: Climax! The genius Diaz vs Japan
7.SummaryEnglish: Under 3-0, Japan suffers the speed and technique of the Argentine team and its best player Ramierez,
7.TitleJapanese: 白熱! 天才ディアス対全日本

8.TitleEnglish: Playoffs! Clash of the best four
8.SummaryEnglish: Once the last game of the elimination round is over, Japan enters the semifinals.
8.TitleJapanese: 決戦! ベスト4の激突

9.SummaryEnglish: Germany beat Uruguay thanks to the debut of a phenomenal goalkeeper, which leaves the Japanese team surprised
9.TitleJapanese: 反撃! ホームタウンディシジョンを破れ

10.SummaryEnglish: A very tight game, where the real fight is played in midfield
10.TitleJapanese: 激闘! 血まみれの死守

11.TitleEnglish: The final! Challenge the Steel Giant
11.SummaryEnglish: The final of the first world youth championships begins, facing West Germany and Japan.
11.TitleJapanese: 決勝! 鋼鉄の巨人に挑め

12.TitleEnglish: Pursuit! Has the number one in the world been seen?
12.SummaryEnglish: Exciting game between Germany and Japan, with both goalkeepers in evidence.
12.TitleJapanese: 追撃! 世界一が見えた?

13.TitleEnglish: Soar, Tsubasa! Oath to the sky
13.SummaryEnglish: Very little is missing at the end of the game and the result is tied. Germany and Japan see extra time approaching
13.TitleJapanese: 翼よ翔け! 大空への誓い
